item.title: Latest Release
item.description: This article contains a summary of recent changes, enhancements and bug fixes in Aspose.OCR for Python via .NET 24.1.0 (January 2024) release. What was changed Key Summary Category n/a Improved text overlay positioning in searchable PDFs. Enhancement n/a Resolved an issue where dark areas in searchable PDF background images were incorrectly rendered in inverted colors. Fix Public API changes and backwards compatibility This section lists all public API changes introduced in Aspose.
